name: CAMPAIGN FRANKLIN
summary: Campaign Franklin depicts General Hood's desperate attempt to reach the Ohio River in Tennessee and thwart General Sherman's advance in Georgia. But stubborn Union defenses along with his own mistakes will foil his plans.
info:
• 开发: HPS Simulations
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
